title: Bug 7752 - Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt').
3. From the main menu, select 'File' -> 'Export' and select 'Zip File' to export.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the zip file fails to store the files properly.
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
SR:
Launch WSWB and create two projects.
1. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt').
2. From the main menu, select 'File' -> 'Export' and select 'Zip File' to export.
3. Verify that the zip file successfully stores all the files with the same name under different directories.
